title: Harold on Social Media (Person of Interest)( 1 x 18)
author: Person of Interest Highlights
comment: This was ahead of it's time. Love this show.
Wouldn't it be interesting if in the real world social media was invented to give information to an illegal ASI being used by the US government?
description:
One of Harold and Johns morning conversations about a new number. This particular conversation gets around to how and why Harold made social media.
